name: nimble
content:

quick and exact either in movement or thoughts: nimble fingers/feet His nimble mind calculated the answer before I could key the numbers into my computer. Synonym
spry

quick and exact in movement or thought; agile: a nimble mind He tried to catch his friend, but she was too nimble.
